data.title: Playing Seeker
data.statement: It is your first year at a Wizarding School and you decide to try out for the quidditch team. They don't normally accept first years but you are really good at finding the golden snitch. To be so good you need an algorithm to find it among all the other balls in play in a grid. The game has 1 Quaffle, 2 Bludgers and 1 Golden Snitch. This school is really concerned with style so the character that represents the snitch and the bludgers (and the background) changes everytime but the Quaffle is always a capital {{Q}}.

data.outputDescription: The coordinates {{X}},{{Y}} of the Golden Snitch. [Grid starts at 1,1 at the top left corner]

lastVersion.statementHTML:
Goal

It is your first year at a Wizarding School and you decide to try out for the quidditch team. They don't normally accept first years but you are really good at finding the golden snitch. To be so good you need an algorithm to find it among all the other balls in play in a grid. The game has 1 Quaffle, 2 Bludgers and 1 Golden Snitch. This school is really concerned with style so the character that represents the snitch and the bludgers (and the background) changes everytime but the Quaffle is always a capital Q.
Input
Line 1: An integer S that determines the size of the grid
S next lines: The rows to the grid in the following form:
3
nnQ
nBS
Bnn
Output
The coordinates X,Y of the Golden Snitch. [Grid starts at 1,1 at the top left corner]
Constraints
1 < S < 1001
Example
Input
3
bbQ
BBS
bbb
Output
3 2
